name: Deflector shields
content:
Deflector Shields are the standard shield modules used by spaceships, absorbing a reasonable amount of damage while being capable of regenerating in battle. 

As virtually all current shield technology, it can only block high velocity projectiles and energy beams, still allowing through slower moving missiles or torpedoes. 

The cyclic generator keeps strengthening the shield even while under fire and in the even of a shield bubble collapse, it is capable of restoring it within a minute. 

Note that installing multiple shield modules on a single ship has diminishing returns.
